title: What to See: Nine Art Exhibitions to Visit Over the Holidays
sub_head: A two-museum Jasper Johns retrospective, Titian’s sumptuous Venetian color, collecting Matisse and more.
body: This fall has seen the most abundant selection of art exhibitions since before the Covid-19 lockdown began in March 2020. Below, the Journal’s critics guide you through the best shows of the holiday season, some of which are closing soon.
